dct_title_s: Antiquæ urbis Romæ imago accuratiss. ex vetustis monumentis, ex vestigiis videlicet ædificior., Moeniûm ruinis, fide numismatum, monumentis æneis, plumbeis, saxeis tiglinisq. collecta, veter. deniq
dct_description_sm: Bird's-eye-view map showing buildings and streets of ancient Rome with 269 points of interest. Title cartouche above; cartouche around legend below with a human figure to the left and right. Original edition by Pirro Ligorio, approximately 1552.
